message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique and valuable item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can you consider that?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $85. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice! However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Could you consider $82?

I understand you're still a bit tight on budget, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $84. It's a fair price that still reflects the value of the product, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice! However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Could you consider $81?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob! I can sell the product to you for $83. It's a fair price that still reflects the value of the product, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Could you consider $82.50?
I'm really close to my minimum price, Bob! I can sell the product to you for $82.75. It's a fair price that still reflects the value of the product, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
I'm close to my budget, Alice. I'm willing to go one more round. Could you consider $82?
